subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Scott Upshall scored with 3 minutes 4 seconds left in the third period Saturday night and the Philadelphia Flyers advanced to the Eastern Conference finals with a 6-4 victory over the Montreal Canadiens.
snippet: Scott Upshall scored with 3 minutes 4 seconds left in the third period Saturday night and the Philadelphia Flyers advanced to the Eastern Conference finals with a 6-4 victory over the Montreal Canadiens.
